member.name: M:Travel_Ginie_App.Server.Controllers.TravelAppController.GetCountries
member.summary: Return a list of all countries in the world
member.respons: Returns List of Alll Countries In the world
Returns an error message if faild to retreive countries

member.name: M:Travel_Ginie_App.Server.Controllers.TravelAppController.GetCities(System.String)
member.summary: Return a list of all Cities in a country
member.param: The Country where the cities are found in.
member.respons: Returns List of All cities In the Country
Returns an error message if faild to retreive cities

member.name: M:Travel_Ginie_App.Server.Controllers.TravelAppController.GetEventsByCity(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return a list of Events in a City
member.param: The City whre the event takes place.
member.respons: Returns List of All events in a city
Returns an error message if faild to retreive Events

member.name: M:Travel_Ginie_App.Server.Controllers.TravelAppController.GetGeoIDCity(System.String)
member.summary: Return the geoid of a City
member.param: The City whre the event takes place.
member.respons: Returns the universal geographical ID of a city
Returns an error message if faild to retreive geoid

member.name: M:Travel_Ginie_App.Server.Controllers.TravelAppController.GetRestaurantsByCity(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of restaurants in a specified city.
member.param: The name of the city for which restaurants are to be retrieved.
member.returns: A list of restaurant data if successful, otherwise returns an error message.
member.response: Returns a list of restaurants in the specified city.
If there is an error while retrieving the restaurants, returns an error message.
